critique: The document is a legal order regarding the Manual for Courts-Martial. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is likely a sense of order and justice. There is little emotional language used, so most scores will be low. The document aims to inspire confidence and respect for the legal process within the Army. Initial scores: Joy: 2, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 2, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 3. Revised scores: Joy: 2, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 2, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 3
